text: The Four Selves with Andrew Cohen
There are four distinct levels of self that we need to understand.
The first is the egoic self, the separate self.
This is who we think we are most of the time.
The second is the authentic self.
This is who we really are beneath the ego.
The third is the higher self.
This is our connection to the divine.
The fourth is the true self.
This is our ultimate nature, beyond all concepts.
Understanding these four selves is crucial.
It's the foundation of spiritual transformation.
